Content.IntroText:
# Your Experts in Stucco & Siding
### Pacific Stucco & Construction LLC

MobileFile.alternativeText: Storefront with a covered patio, hanging lights and white stucco siding

Content.Title: Bringing precision, durability, and beauty to every project

children.text: As specialists in exterior finishes‚Äîincluding stucco and siding‚Äîand skilled in interior plaster work, we provide high-quality solutions that elevate both the look and protection of your home or building.

With years of hands-on experience and a commitment to exceptional craftsmanship, we work with homeowners, builders, and developers across the region to deliver long-lasting, expertly applied finishes that stand up to the elements and stand out for their visual appeal.

asset.alternativeText: Exterior view of El Paraiso restaurant, complete with white stucco and black accents

Content.caption:
### Stucco Installation & Repair    
From new construction to renovations, we provide seamless stucco finishes that are built to last. Choose from traditional or synthetic systems tailored to your project‚Äôs needs.

asset.alternativeText: Planter with a small shrub that is getting decorated with light colored stucco

Content.caption:
### Siding Solutions    
We install and repair a variety of siding materials, including fiber cement, wood, and composite siding, to enhance curb appeal and protect your home.

asset.alternativeText: Commercial building with dark grey and cream colored stucco

Content.caption:
### Interior Plastering     
Smooth, clean, and custom-finished plaster interiors bring elegance and durability to your indoor spaces. Perfect for both modern and classic styles.

children.text: Whether you're building from the ground up, upgrading your home‚Äôs exterior, or refreshing your interior walls, Pacific Stucco & Construction LLC is your trusted partner for premium finishing work.

MobileFile.alternativeText: Storefront with a covered patio, hanging lights and white stucco siding

children.text: At Pacific Stucco & Construction LLC, we take pride in providing high-quality exterior and interior finishing services to homeowners, builders, and contractors throughout Medford, Oregon and the surrounding communities. With a focus on stucco, siding, and interior plastering, we combine expert craftsmanship with dependable service to deliver results that last.

We are a locally owned and operated company built on a foundation of hard work, integrity, and attention to detail. Every member of our team is highly trained and committed to upholding the highest standards of quality, whether we're applying a custom stucco finish, installing weather-resistant siding, or crafting smooth, polished interior plaster surfaces.

children.text: Whether you're remodeling, building new, or simply updating the look of your property, Pacific Stucco & Construction LLC is here to bring your vision to life with expert exterior and interior finishes.

Medford, Central Point, Ashland, Eagle Point, Grants Pass
, and surrounding areas in Southern Oregon.

Content.IntroText: # Exterior and Interior Finishes Built to Last

MobileFile.alternativeText: Storefront with a covered patio, hanging lights and white stucco siding

children.text: At Pacific Stucco & Construction, we specialize in delivering high-quality finishes that enhance both the beauty and durability of your property. From detailed stucco applications to clean, professional plaster interiors, we provide expert service to residential and commercial clients throughout Medford, Oregon and the surrounding areas.
Whether you're building new or refreshing an existing surface, stucco is a versatile, long-lasting exterior finish that offers timeless appeal. We provide:
New Stucco Installation
‚Äì Traditional or synthetic systems tailored to your project
Stucco Repair & Restoration
‚Äì Fix cracks, water damage, or aging surfaces
Custom Texture & Color Matching
‚Äì Seamless finishes that match your vision or existing fa√ßade
Our team ensures every stucco job is done with expert precision, ensuring maximum performance and visual appeal.

Pictures.alternativeText: Planter with a small shrub that is getting decorated with light colored stucco
Commercial building with dark grey and cream colored stucco

children.text: Siding is your home or building‚Äôs first line of defense‚Äîand its first impression. We install and repair a variety of siding materials, including:
Fiber Cement (James Hardie, etc.)
Wood and Cedar Siding
Composite and Engineered Wood Siding
Lap, Panel, and Shingle Styles
We help you choose the right siding for your property's architecture, performance needs, and budget, ensuring a clean, weather-resistant finish that lasts.

Pictures.alternativeText: Large house that is under construction, but has a tan stucco finish
Rear view of a large and square commercial building with white stucco and gray edges
Asphalt parking lot with store signage announcing a "star donuts" and a building in the background with white stucco exterior

children.text: Smooth, durable, and elegant‚Äîour plaster interior services bring craftsmanship and comfort indoors. Ideal for both modern and traditional interiors, we offer:
Custom Wall & Ceiling Plastering
Textured and Smooth Finishes
Plaster Repair & Surface Refinishing
Whether you're restoring an older home or adding artisanal character to new construction, our plaster work creates timeless results.
